title: KALOUR Premium Colored Pencils,Set of 50 Colors,Artists Soft Core with Vibrant Color,Ideal for Layering Blending Shading,Color Pencils for Adults Beginners Coloring Book…
description: Kalour Premium Colored Pencils,Set of 50 Colors,Artists Soft Core with Vibrant Color,Ideal for Drawing Sketching Shading,Coloring Pencils for Adults Beginners
features: Complete Color Pencil Set: Contains 50 premium colored pencils in eco-friendly tube for artists to express creativity and ideas in vibrant and colorful way.
Premium Colored Pencils: Each pencil has unique number and color name for easy identification and high lightfastness for stable colors.
Soft Core: The soft texture of colored pencil cores allows blending, layering and gradient effects for rich color effects.
High Pigment: Colored pencil cores contain highly concentrated pigments for vibrant and saturated colors suitable for detailed drawing.
Creation & Relaxation: Coloring and drawing can serve as a means of relaxation and stress relief while expressing creativity and emotions.
Portable Tube Gift: Mini tube is portable for artists to create artwork anytime and anywhere with no additional equipment.
